claim: Mammals are a clade of endothermic amniotes and are important for life on earth.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Mammals are any vertebrates within the class Mammalia  (  -LSB- məˈmeɪli.ə -RSB- from Latin mamma #Latin `` breast ''  )  , a clade of endothermic amniotes distinguished from reptiles  (  including birds  )  by the possession of a neocortex  (  a region of the brain  )  , hair , three middle ear bones and mammary glands .
